title: I wasted MORE money on MYSTERY TECH!
description: A portion of this video was sponsored by NHTSA. Click here  to learn more about how these driver assistance technologies can keep you and your loved ones safe on the road.  Orion Nintendo Switch Monitor on Amazon:  Creepy LED Mask on Amazon:  Logitech MX Master 3S on Amazon:  Logitech MX Mechanical Mini on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe to Ken's channel @Denki!  More shenanigans on @thisis:    My new F1 show @TheBackmarkers:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
transcript: - Hey, Mystery Tech. And today, we have a word from our sponsor, NHTSA. There is no respawn button in real life, which is why NHTSA is dedicated to keeping people safe. They sponsored this segment of the video to tell you about driver assistance technologies to keep in mind when you are shopping for your next vehicle. Save the racing seats for your gaming chair. When you look for a new vehicle, put driver assistance technologies at the top of your shopping list. Take like lane keep assistance, which will redirect your car into your lane if you drift out of it. And blind spot intervention, which will tell you if a car is in your blind spot, whether you can actually see it or not. In 2020, 38,680 people died from car crashes. Many of them were caused by driver error, which is something preventable by these technologies. Driver assistance technologies keep you and the people in your car safe. They also hold the potential to reduce traffic crashes and save thousands of lives per year. You can go to NHTSA.gov/drivertech or click the link in the description below to learn more about driver assistance technologies that can save you and your loved ones.
